abstract.t: This draft introduces some extensions for MIPv6 and neighbourdiscovery to allow for the introduction of a hierarchical MIPv6mobility management model. The proposed hierarchical mobilitymanagement for MIPv6 will reduce the amount of signalling to CNs andthe HA and may also improve the performance of MIPv6 in terms ofhandoff speed. Moreover, HMIPv6 is well-suited to implement accesscontrol and handoffs between different access technologies.
